news.title: Meta strikes AI chip deal with AMD days after committing to deploy millions of Nvidia GPUs
news.summary: AMD has secured Meta as a customer for its Helios rack-scale system. The move comes as Nvidia's Blackwell faces heightened competition.

news.title: Fed's Goolsbee calls for a hold on cuts as current rate of inflation is 'not good enough'
news.summary: The Chicago Fed president said cuts aren't appropriate until there's more evidence that inflation is on its way down. The cuts won't take effect until there is more evidence of a slowdown in inflation, he said.

news.title: Warner Bros. Discovery says Paramount makes higher bid, board will weigh offer against Netflix deal
news.summary: Netflix has four days to improve its previously agreed-upon bid for Paramount. If WBD deems the new Paramount offer superior, Netflix will have to increase its offer.

news.title: Novo Nordisk to slash GLP-1 list prices by up to 50% in U.S. to cut costs for insured patients
news.summary: The cuts aim to make the drugs more accessible to insured patients, particularly people with high-deductible health plans or co-insurance benefit designs.

news.title: Stripe valued at $159 billion after tender offer for employees, shareholders
news.summary: Fintech startup Stripe continues to show strong growth, with a valuation now at $159 billion. Total volume nearing $2 trillion last year.

news.title: 10 stocks Wall Street expects to roar back after dropping at least 20% in 2026
news.summary: Analysts expect these stocks to soar at least 46% over the next 12 months. Analysts expect the stocks to rise at least 44% in the next year. The shares of these companies are expected to rise 46% or more in the coming year.

news.title: ‘I found out too late’: My stepmother cheated me out of $500K from my father’s estate. What can I do?
news.summary: “Within a week or two after the deadline to contest the will expired, my stepmother sent me an email stating she would not share anything,” he says.

news.title: Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly shares both fall after Novo’s price-cut plan for Ozempic and Wegovy
news.summary: Shares of Novo Nordisk and rival Eli Lilly fell on Tuesday after a report said price cuts are coming for popular weight-loss drugs.

news.title: Intuit’s stock pops as new Anthropic partnership calms some nerves around AI disruption
news.summary: Intuit's stock has been the S&P 500's worst performer this year. Now the company is teaming up with the company that’s fueled investor fears.

news.title: FedEx starts the fight for tariff refunds by suing the Trump administration
news.summary: FedEx filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration for refunds on tariffs paid. The company is seeking refunds for tariffs paid to the U.S. government.
